originContent: 一个简洁、高效的 12306 余票监控工具，当出现余票时，可通过多种方式推送通知。
translatedContent: A simple and efficient 12306 ticket availability monitoring tool that can send notifications through various methods when tickets become available.

originContent: > 本程序仅用于学习和监控 12306 官网的余票信息，并非抢票软件，也不会增加任何抢票相关功能。程序作者不对监控结果的准确性做出任何保证，不为任何因使用本程序而产生的商业或法律纠纷负责。
translatedContent: > This program is only for learning and monitoring ticket availability information on the official 12306 website. It is not a ticket-snatching software and does not include any ticket-snatching features. The author does not guarantee the accuracy of the monitoring results and is not responsible for any commercial or legal disputes arising from the use of this program.
Through the interactive interface, you can:

originContent: - 🔍 输入出发地、目的地、日期，实时查询车次列表
translatedContent: - 🔍 Enter departure, destination, and date to query the train list in real time

originContent: - 📋 查看完整的车次信息和余票情况
translatedContent: - 📋 View complete train information and ticket availability

originContent: - ⚙️ 动态选择监控车次和席别
translatedContent: - ⚙️ Dynamically select trains and seat types to monitor

originContent: - 💾 自动生成和保存配置文件
translatedContent: - 💾 Automatically generate and save configuration files
- 🚀 Start the monitoring program with one click
For detailed usage instructions, please refer to [CLI_GUIDE.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wxory/CRTMonitor/main/CLI_GUIDE.md)

originContent: ## 方式一：使用预编译程序 (推荐)
在项目的 Releases 页面下载对应您操作系统的最新版本。
translatedContent: Download the latest version corresponding to your operating system from the project's Releases page.

originContent: 首次运行程序会自动生成一份 config.yml 模板文件。请根据 [参数配置](#配置-1) 说明修改该文件。
translatedContent: The program will automatically generate a config.yml template file upon first run. Please modify this file according to the [Parameter Configuration](#配置-1) instructions.

originContent: 将配置好的 config.yml 文件放置于可执行程序的同一目录下，然后直接运行即可。
translatedContent: Place the configured config.yml file in the same directory as the executable program, then run it directly.

originContent: 前往 [Node.js 官网](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn) 下载并安装，或使用 [包管理器](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/download/package-manager) 安装。
translatedContent: Go to the [Node.js official website](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn) to download and install, or use a [package manager](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/download/package-manager) to install.

originContent: 直接 [下载 Zip 文件](https://github.com/wxory/CRTicketMonitor/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)，或使用 Git：
translatedContent: Download the [Zip file directly](https://github.com/wxory/CRTicketMonitor/archive/refs/heads/main.zip), or use Git:

originContent: #### 前台运行 (适用于所有系统):
translatedContent: #### 前台运行 (适用于所有系统):

originContent: #### 后台运行 (适用于 Linux 服务器):
translatedContent: #### Running in the Background (Applicable to Linux Servers):

originContent: 项目内置了 run.sh 脚本，它使用 screen 来实现后台持久化运行。
translatedContent: The project includes a built-in run.sh script that uses screen to achieve persistent background execution.

originContent: # 确保已安装 screen: sudo apt install screen (Debian/Ubuntu)
translatedContent: # 确保已安装 screen: sudo apt install screen (Debian/Ubuntu)

originContent: 程序启动时会查找同目录下的 config.yml 文件。如果文件不存在，将自动创建一个模板。
translatedContent: The program will look for a config.yml file in the same directory when it starts. If the file does not exist, a template will be created automatically.

originContent: 以下是一个完整的配置示例：
translatedContent: Below is a complete configuration example:

originContent: # 🚄 China Railway Ticket Monitor 配置文件
translatedContent: # 🚄 China Railway Ticket Monitor 配置文件

originContent: # 详细配置说明请参考 README.md
translatedContent: # 详细配置说明请参考 README.md

originContent: # 查询列表 - 可添加多个查询条件
translatedContent: # 查询列表 - 可添加多个查询条件

originContent: from: "上海" # 起点站（包含同城站）
translatedContent: from: "上海" # 起点站（包含同城站）

originContent: to: "北京" # 终点站（包含同城站）
translatedContent: to: "北京" # 终点站（包含同城站）

originContent: # 车次列表（可选）- 不填时默认为全部车次
translatedContent: # 车次列表（可选）- 不填时默认为全部车次

originContent: from: "上海" # 指定起点站（可选）
translatedContent: from: "上海" # 指定起点站（可选）

originContent: to: "北京南" # 指定终点站（可选）
translatedContent: to: "北京南" # 指定终点站（可选）

originContent: seatCategory: # 限定席别（可选，详见下文）
translatedContent: seatCategory: # 限定席别（可选，详见下文）

originContent: checkRoundTrip: true # 查询全程车票情况（可选）
translatedContent: checkRoundTrip: true # 查询全程车票情况（可选）

originContent: # 推送配置 - 支持多种推送方式（详见下文）
translatedContent: # 推送配置 - 支持多种推送方式（详见下文）

originContent: webhook: "" # 飞书机器人 Webhook URL
translatedContent: webhook: "" # 飞书机器人 Webhook URL

originContent: group: "火车票监控" # 推送分组（可选）
translatedContent: group: "火车票监控" # 推送分组（可选）

originContent: # 刷新间隔（分钟，可选，默认 15 分钟）
translatedContent: # 刷新间隔（分钟，可选，默认 15 分钟）

originContent: # 访问延迟（秒，可选，默认 5 秒）
translatedContent: # 访问延迟（秒，可选，默认 5 秒）

originContent: 目前支持飞书推送、Telegram 推送、企业微信推送、Bark 推送和 SMTP 邮件推送通知。
translatedContent: Currently supports Feishu push, Telegram push, WeCom push, Bark push, and SMTP email push notifications.

originContent: 获取飞书机器人的 webhook 地址可参考[飞书开发文档](https://open.feishu.cn/document/client-docs/bot-v3/add-custom-bot)
translatedContent: To obtain the webhook address for the Feishu bot, refer to the [Feishu Developer Documentation](https://open.feishu.cn/document/client-docs/bot-v3/add-custom-bot)

originContent: 在 `config.yml` 中填写飞书机器人的 Webhook 地址即可，例如：
translatedContent: Fill in the Feishu bot's Webhook address in `config.yml`, for example:

originContent: 为了提高安全性，建议启用飞书机器人的签名校验功能：
translatedContent: To enhance security, it is recommended to enable the signature verification feature for Feishu bots:

originContent: 1. 在飞书群组中，进入自定义机器人的配置页面
translatedContent: 1. In the Feishu group, go to the custom bot configuration page

originContent: 2. 在安全设置中选择"签名校验"
translatedContent: 2. Select "Signature Verification" in the security settings

originContent: 4. 在配置文件中添加 `secret` 字段：
translatedContent: 4. Add the `secret` field in the configuration file:

originContent: secret: "your-secret-key" # 签名密钥（可选，启用签名校验时必填）
translatedContent: secret: "your-secret-key" # 签名密钥（可选，启用签名校验时必填）

originContent: - 签名密钥用于验证消息来源的可信性，防止恶意调用
translatedContent: - The signature key is used to verify the authenticity of the message source and prevent malicious calls

originContent: - 启用签名校验后，所有请求都需要通过签名验证
translatedContent: - After enabling signature verification, all requests must pass signature validation

originContent: - 签名算法使用 HmacSHA256 + Base64 编码
translatedContent: - The signature algorithm uses HmacSHA256 + Base64 encoding

originContent: 使用 Telegram 推送需要先创建一个 Telegram 机器人并获取相关信息：
translatedContent: To use Telegram push notifications, you need to first create a Telegram bot and obtain relevant information:

originContent: 1. 在 Telegram 中找到 [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) 并发送 `/newbot` 创建新机器人
translatedContent: 1. Find [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) in Telegram and send `/newbot` to create a new bot

originContent: 2. 按照提示设置机器人名称和用户名，获取机器人 Token
translatedContent: 2. Follow the prompts to set the bot's name and username, and get the bot Token

originContent: 3. 将机器人添加到您的聊天中，或直接与机器人私聊
translatedContent: 3. Add the bot to your chat, or chat directly with the bot

originContent: - 发送消息给机器人后，访问 `https://api.telegram.org/bot<YOUR_BOT_TOKEN>/getUpdates`
translatedContent: - After sending a message to the bot, visit `https://api.telegram.org/bot<YOUR_BOT_TOKEN>/getUpdates`

originContent: - 在返回的 JSON 中找到 `chat.id` 字段
translatedContent: - Find the `chat.id` field in the returned JSON

originContent: 在 `config.yml` 中配置 Telegram 推送：
chatId: "123456789" # Chat ID（可以是个人ID或群组ID）
translatedContent: chatId: "123456789" # Chat ID（可以是个人ID或群组ID）

originContent: 使用企业微信推送需要先创建企业微信群机器人：
translatedContent: To use Enterprise WeChat push, you need to first create an Enterprise WeChat group bot:

originContent: 1. 在企业微信群中，点击群设置 → 群机器人 → 添加机器人
translatedContent: 1. In the Enterprise WeChat group, click Group Settings → Group Bot → Add Bot

originContent: 2. 设置机器人名称和头像，获取 Webhook URL
translatedContent: 2. Set the bot name and avatar, then obtain the Webhook URL

originContent: 3. 复制完整的 Webhook URL（包含 key 参数）
translatedContent: 3. Copy the complete Webhook URL (including the key parameter)

originContent: 在 `config.yml` 中配置企业微信推送：
Bark 是一个 iOS 推送通知应用，支持通过 API 发送推送到 iPhone/iPad。
translatedContent: Bark is an iOS push notification app that supports sending pushes to iPhone/iPad via API.

originContent: #### 获取 Bark 设备密钥
1. 在 App Store 下载并安装 [Bark](https://apps.apple.com/app/bark-customed-notifications/id1403753865) 应用
translatedContent: 1. Download and install the [Bark](https://apps.apple.com/app/bark-customed-notifications/id1403753865) app from the App Store

originContent: 2. 打开应用，复制显示的设备密钥（Device Key）
translatedContent: 2. Open the app and copy the displayed Device Key

originContent: 3. 可选：如果你有自己的 Bark 服务器，也可以修改服务器地址
translatedContent: 3. Optional: If you have your own Bark server, you can also modify the server address

originContent: 在 `config.yml` 中配置 Bark 推送：
serverUrl: "https://api.day.app" # 可选：服务器地址，默认官方服务器
translatedContent: serverUrl: "https://api.day.app" # 可选：服务器地址，默认官方服务器

originContent: group: "火车票监控" # 可选：推送分组
translatedContent: group: "火车票监控" # 可选：推送分组

originContent: level: "active" # 推送级别：active(默认)/critical(重要)/timeSensitive(时效)/passive(静默)
translatedContent: level: "active" # 推送级别：active(默认)/critical(重要)/timeSensitive(时效)/passive(静默)

originContent: url: "https://example.com" # 点击推送后跳转的URL
translatedContent: url: "https://example.com" # 点击推送后跳转的URL

originContent: autoCopy: false # 是否自动复制推送内容
translatedContent: autoCopy: false # 是否自动复制推送内容

originContent: isArchive: true # 是否保存到推送历史
translatedContent: isArchive: true # 是否保存到推送历史

originContent: - `active`（默认）：系统会立即亮屏显示通知
translatedContent: - `active` (default): The system will immediately light up the screen to display the notification

originContent: - `critical`：重要警告，在静音模式下也会响铃
translatedContent: - `critical`: Important warning, will ring even in silent mode

originContent: - `timeSensitive`：时效性通知，可在专注状态下显示通知
translatedContent: - `timeSensitive`: Time-sensitive notification, can display notifications during Focus mode

originContent: - `passive`：仅将通知添加到通知列表，不会亮屏提醒
translatedContent: - `passive`: Only adds the notification to the notification list, no screen lighting reminder

originContent: SMTP 邮件推送支持通过标准邮件服务器发送余票通知邮件。
translatedContent: SMTP email push supports sending ticket availability notification emails through standard mail servers.

originContent: #### 配置 SMTP 邮件推送
在 `config.yml` 中配置 SMTP 邮件推送：
pass: "your-app-password" # 必填：邮箱密码或应用密码
translatedContent: pass: "your-app-password" # 必填：邮箱密码或应用密码

originContent: to: "recipient@example.com" # 必填：收件人邮箱地址
translatedContent: to: "recipient@example.com" # 必填：收件人邮箱地址

originContent: from: "12306监控 <your-email@gmail.com>" # 发件人显示名称
translatedContent: from: "12306监控 <your-email@gmail.com>" # 发件人显示名称

originContent: secure: true # 是否使用SSL/TLS (465端口使用true，587端口使用false)
translatedContent: secure: true # 是否使用SSL/TLS (465端口使用true，587端口使用false)

originContent: # 需要开启两步验证并生成应用密码
translatedContent: # 需要开启两步验证并生成应用密码

originContent: # 需要开启SMTP服务并使用授权码
translatedContent: # 需要开启SMTP服务并使用授权码

originContent: # 需要开启SMTP服务并使用授权码
translatedContent: # 需要开启SMTP服务并使用授权码
- **Gmail**: Two-step verification needs to be enabled, and an app-specific password generated

originContent: - **Gmail**: 需要开启两步验证，生成应用专用密码
translatedContent: - **QQ Mail**: SMTP service needs to be enabled in settings, using an authorization code as the password

originContent: - **QQ 邮箱**: 需要在设置中开启 SMTP 服务，使用授权码作为密码
translatedContent: - **163 Mail**: SMTP service needs to be enabled, using an authorization code as the password

originContent: - **163 邮箱**: 需要开启 SMTP 服务，使用授权码作为密码
translatedContent: - **Enterprise Mail**: Configured according to the requirements of the enterprise mail provider

originContent: - **企业邮箱**: 根据企业邮箱服务商的要求配置

translatedContent: - `25`: Standard SMTP port (usually blocked by ISPs)

originContent: - `25`: 标准 SMTP 端口（通常被 ISP 封禁）

translatedContent: In this way, when there are remaining tickets, the program will send notifications through the corresponding platform.

originContent: 这样，当有余票时，程序会通过相应的平台发送通知。

translatedContent: Available seat types are as follows:
- `Soft Sleeper` (including first-class soft sleeper on bullet trains)
